name: Multilingual Voice Quality
description: Evaluates voice synthesis quality across multiple languages, including pronunciation accuracy and accent authenticity.

metrics.name: mos_per_language
metrics.definition: MOS quality score for each language

test_method: Evaluate TTS quality across supported languages with native speaker panels. Test phonetic coverage and language-specific phenomena.
notes: Multilingual evaluation requires native speakers for each language. Quality often varies significantly across languages based on training data availability.
